title: 87/201/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 March 1987 changing the import arrangements established by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3420/83 and applied in the Benelux countries, Denmark and the United Kingdom in respect of the People's Republic of China (Only the Danish, English, French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 March 1987
changing the import arrangements established by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3420/83 and applied in the Benelux countries, Denmark and the United Kingdom in respect of the People's Republic of China
(Only the Danish, English, French and Dutch texts are authentic)
(87/201/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative restrictions on the release for free circulation in the Member States specified in the Annex, of the goods therein indicated originating in China, are hereby abolished.

This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, the Kingdom of the Netherlands, the Kingdom of Denmark and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
This Decision shall apply from 31 March 1987.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 March 1987.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 346, 8. 12. 1983, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 123, 11. 5. 1978, p. 2.
